p: In situ analyses using probes E38E38b and E38E39 on human entorhinal cortex and hippocampal areas CA4 and dentate gyrus (DG) not only validated the expression of SORL1-38b, but also confirmed how most E38b-transcripts are located at the dendritic part of neurons opposed to somatic localization of SORL1-fl (positive for E38E39) in these brain regions (Fig.Â 3e).
